original_text: One of the people there was a servant of the leader of the priests. He belonged to the same family as the man whose ear Peter had cut off. This servant said to Peter, ‘I am sure that I saw you in the garden with Jesus.’
korean_text: 대제사장의 종 하나는 베드로에게 귀를 잘린 사람의 친척이라 이르되 네가 그 사람과 함께 동산에 있는 것을 내가 보지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: One of the people there was a servant
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에 있던 사람 중 한 명은 종이었습니다

sentences.original_text: of the leader of the priests
He belonged to the same family
as the man whose ear Peter had cut off
'I am sure that I saw you
